attributes.action: Royal Marine A Release & Rehabilitation RMARAR
attributes.additional_details:
Royal Marine A Rehabilitation
This Petition calls for a broader review of ‘Royal Marine A’, based on the general public’s support for this petition calling for ‘General Sir Nick Houghton’,  to review with regards the mental health issues involved in serving in  Afghanistan for all service personnel on the front line and how summary executions and war crimes maybe a result of loosing comrades?  Indicating how mental welfare for front line soldiers depends on remaining inside the Geneva convention whilst coping with loss of life and atrocities may cause a form of mental instability not yet diagnosed.
